00018 SECryptoAES::SECryptoAES()
00019 {
00020     this->setObjectName("SECryptoAES");
00021     m_logger = new Logger(this);
00022     m_init = new QCA::Initializer;
00023 
00024     m_isQcaCompatible = QCA::isSupported("aes128-cbc-pkcs7");
00025 
00026     if( m_isQcaCompatible )
00027     {
00028         m_logger->info(name() + ": aes128-cbc-pkcs7 supported by system [OK]");
00029         m_key = QCA::SymmetricKey( QString(name()+"%/.?!:;]{[}&").toUtf8() );
00030     }
00031     else
00032     {
00033         m_logger->warning(name() + ": aes128-cbc-pkcs7 supported by system [KO]");
00034         QList<QCA::Provider*> prov = QCA::providers();
00035         m_logger->debug("> QCA2: " + QString::number(prov.size()) + " providers found");
00036         for(int i = 0; i<prov.size(); i++)
00037             m_logger->debug(prov.at(i)->name());
00038         
00039         m_logger->debug(QCA::pluginDiagnosticText());
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 SECryptoAES::~SECryptoAES()
00044 {
00045     delete m_init;
00046     delete m_logger;
00047 }

00049 QString SECryptoAES::name() const
00050 {
00051     return QString( "Silent Eye Encryption "+typeSupported() );
00052 }
00053 
00054 QString SECryptoAES::version() const
00055 {
00056     return QString("0.1.0");
00057 }

00059 QString SECryptoAES::typeSupported() const
00060 {
00061     return QString("AES128");
00062 }
00063 
00064 EncodedData SECryptoAES::encode(QString key, EncodedData msg)
00065 {
00066     if(!m_isQcaCompatible){
00067         throw ModuleException("aes128-cbc-pkcs7 is not supported by the system.");
00068     }
00069 
00070     QCA::InitializationVector iv( QCA::SecureArray(key.toUtf8()) );
00071 
00072     // create a 128 bit AES cipher object using Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode
00073     QCA::Cipher cipher(QString("aes128"),QCA::Cipher::CBC,
00074                        // use Default padding, which is equivalent to PKCS7 for CBC
00075                        QCA::Cipher::DefaultPadding,
00076                        // this object will encrypt
00077                        QCA::Encode,
00078                        m_key, iv);
00079 
00080     // we use the cipher object to encrypt the argument we passed in
00081     // the result of that is returned - note that if there is less than
00082     // 1 block, then nothing will be returned - it is buffered
00083     // update() can be called as many times as required.
00084     QCA::SecureArray u = cipher.update( QCA::SecureArray(msg.bytes()) );
00085 
00086     if (!cipher.ok())
00087         throw ModuleException("An error occured during the encryption process.",
00088                               "An error occured during the cipher update !");
00089 
00090     m_logger->debug("AES128 encryption of " + QCA::arrayToHex(msg.bytes()) + " is " + QCA::arrayToHex(u.toByteArray()) );
00091 
00092     // Because we are using PKCS7 padding, we need to output the final (padded) block
00093     // Note that we should always call final() even with no padding, to clean up
00094     QCA::SecureArray f = cipher.final();
00095 
00096     if (!cipher.ok())
00097         throw ModuleException("An error occured during the encryption process.",
00098                               "An error occured during the finalization of the cipher !");
00099 
00100     return EncodedData( u.append(f).toByteArray() );
00101 }
00102 
00103 EncodedData SECryptoAES::decode(QString key, EncodedData data)
00104 {
00105     if(!m_isQcaCompatible){
00106         throw ModuleException("aes128-cbc-pkcs7 is not supported by the system.");
00107     }
00108 
00109     QCA::InitializationVector iv( QCA::SecureArray(key.toUtf8()) );
00110 
00111     // create a 128 bit AES cipher object using Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode
00112     QCA::Cipher cipher(QString("aes128"),QCA::Cipher::CBC,
00113                        // use Default padding, which is equivalent to PKCS7 for CBC
00114                        QCA::Cipher::DefaultPadding,
00115                        // this object will encrypt
00116                        QCA::Decode,
00117                        m_key, iv);
00118 
00119     // take that cipher text, and decrypt it
00120     QCA::SecureArray plainText = cipher.update( QCA::SecureArray(data.bytes()) );
00121 
00122     // check if the update() call worked
00123     if (!cipher.ok())
00124         throw ModuleException("An error occured during the decryption process. (wrong password key?)",
00125                               "An error occured during the cipher update !");
00126 
00127     m_logger->debug("AES128 decryption of " + QCA::arrayToHex(data.bytes()) + " is " + QString(plainText.toByteArray()));
00128 
00129     // Again we need to call final(), to get the last block (with its padding removed)
00130     plainText += cipher.final();
00131 
00132     // check if the final() call worked
00133     if (!cipher.ok())
00134         throw ModuleException("An error occured during the decryption process. (wrong password key?)",
00135                               "An error occured during the finalization of the cipher !");
00136 
00137     m_logger->debug("Final block for AES128 decryption is " + QString(plainText.toByteArray()));
00138 
00139     return EncodedData(plainText.toByteArray());
00140 }
